definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (lit. well of the living One that seeth me) Ge 16:14 (where explan., from story of Hagar) Ge 24:62, Ge 25:11 (all J); perh. name of ancient shrine or holy place, cf. Sta:ZAW ii. 347 & Di Ge 16:14; W. of Kadesh, cf. Jer sub Barad, Lag:Onom. 101, 2nd ed. 135, v. Rowlands in Williams:Holy City, 489 Trumbull:Kadesh-Barnea 64.
